board

Class Board

  • java.lang.Object
    • board.Board

  • public class Board
extends java.lang.Object
    The Board class holds the game state and provides useful information about the current configuration.
    Author:
    ________

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      LinkedList<java.lang.Integer> getNetworkSizes(int color)
      Returns a LinkedList of the sizes of all the subnetworks for the specified color.
      int getNumConnections(int color)
      Returns the number of connections between two pieces of the specified color on the board
      int getNumPieces(int color)
      Returns the number of pieces on the board for the specified color.
      LinkedList<player.Move> getValidMoves(int color)
      Provides a LinkedList of all the valide possible moves for the given player.
      boolean hasNetwork(int color)
      Returns true if the player of the specified color has a fully formed network (as defined in the README) and false otherwise.
      boolean isValidMove(player.Move m, int color)
      Returns true if m is a valid move for the specified color, false otherwise.
      void makeMove(player.Move m, int color)
      Updates the board's configuration with the supplied move made by the supplied color.
      void rollback()
      Rolls the board back one move.

    • Method Detail

      • makeMove

        public void makeMove(player.Move m,
            int color)
        Updates the board's configuration with the supplied move made by the supplied color. Assumes that m is a valid move.
        Parameters:
        m - Move to update board with
        color - color of the player who made the move

      • rollback

        public void rollback()
        Rolls the board back one move.

      • getNumPieces

        public int getNumPieces(int color)
        Returns the number of pieces on the board for the specified color.
        Parameters:
        color - color of the player
        Returns:
        the number of pieces of the specified color

      • hasNetwork

        public boolean hasNetwork(int color)
        Returns true if the player of the specified color has a fully formed network (as defined in the README) and false otherwise.
        Parameters:
        color - color of the player
        Returns:
        true if a network for the specified player exists, false otherwise

      • getNetworkSizes

        public LinkedList<java.lang.Integer> getNetworkSizes(int color)
        Returns a LinkedList of the sizes of all the subnetworks for the specified color.
        Parameters:
        color - color of the player
        Returns:
        a list of the sizes of all the subnetworks.

      • isValidMove

        public boolean isValidMove(player.Move m,
                  int color)
        Returns true if m is a valid move for the specified color, false otherwise.
        Parameters:
        m - the move to test
        color - color of the player
        Returns:
        true if valid move, false otherwise
